rules_text:
Choose one – 
• Destroy target artifact.
• The next time target wild creature would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage. [i](Bears, Birds, Cats, Rats, and Spiders are wild creatures.)[/i]
• Exile target undead creature with mana value 2 or less. [i](Skeletons, Spirits, Vampires, Wraiths, and Zombies are undead creatures.)[/i]
